text: Bridge Street is a hamlet in the county of Suffolk, England. It is named after a bridge over Chad Brook which is a tributary of the River Stour. Bridge Street is located on the A134 between Bury St Edmunds and Sudbury and is part of Long Melford.statistics.gov.uk ==References== == Other websites == * British history Edwardstone Priory * Gengraph Category:Hamlets in Suffolk Category:Settlements in Babergh
title: Bridge Street, Suffolk
